description:
Keep your hands warm and dry while pushing yourself in the cold. Whether you’re skinning up to find untouched tracks or working up a sweat shoveling the driveway, the T1 GORE-TEX gloves let your hands breath while protecting them from the elements. Lined with a super soft fleece that traps heat and wicks away moisture, these gloves are great when on the move. And when things slow down or you start your descent, you can throw a liner under these burly gloves.

  • Rugged leather overlay has a water resistant DWR finish
  • GORE-TEX® Infinium back of hand and gauntlet is water resistant and highly breathable
  • GORE-TEX® waterproof breathable liner keep your hands dry
  • Pre-curved fingers give you and natural grip and impressive dexterity
  • Soft fleece lining holds onto warm air, wicks away moisture, and dries quickly
  • Hang loop on the back of the middle fingers let you clip the gloves to your pack, without them filling up with snow
  • Brushed material on the back of the thumb, because sniffles happen
  • Hook and loop closure at the cuff lets you seal out the elements
name: MEC T1 Gore-Tex Gloves - Unisex
